content: rachel s flower square crochet level advanced beginner/intermediate special stitches crochet terms us beg2dccl - ch1 single_crochet ch1 double_crochet in same st or space 2dccl - yo insert hook in indicated space yo and pull up a this pattern is available in english only loop yo and pull through 2 loops 2 times yo and pull through last 3 loops i use a sport weight yarn and hook size 4 5mm my beg3dccl - ch1 single_crochet ch1 counts as first double_crochet 2dccl in same space square measures about 10 5 3dccl - yo insert hook in indicated space yo and pull up a if made with worsted weight yarn and hook size 5 or 5 5 loop yo and pull through 2 loops 3 times yo and pull this square will measure 12 through last 4 loops 4dccl - yo insert hook in indicated space yo and pull up a abbreviations loop yo and pull through 2 loops 4 times yo and pull magic_ring - magic_ring through last 5 loops round - round 2trcl - yo 2 times insert hook in indicated space yo pull up a space - space loop yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times 2 times skip - skip yo pull through all 3 loops st - stitch v-st - double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in same space or st slip_stitch - slip_stitch popcorn - make 5 double_crochet in same st remove hook and insert hook in yo - yarn over top of first double_crochet grab loop and pull through ch1 to close this lp - loop chain does not count as a stitch beg - beginning sppuff - special puff yo insert hook in indicated space and stand - standing pull up a loop 3 times yo and pull through all loops except chain - chain the last loop 2 loops on hook yo and pull through last 2 single_crochet - single_crochet loops double_crochet - double_crochet bpsc - back post single_crochet insert hook from back to front around treble_crochet - treble_crochet the post of indicated st _____________________________________________ fpdc - front post double_crochet insert hook from front to back around the post of indicated st stand single_crochet - with sl knot on hook insert hook into indicated st yo pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops on hook stand bpsc - as bpsc but at the beg with sl knot on hook to start a round ________________________________________________ start with a magic_ring round 1 in magic_ring start with a beg3dccl ch3 3dccl 5 times ch3 slip_stitch in top of beg3dccl to close 6 3dccl 6 ch3 space round 2 skip all cluster from round 1 work only in chain space slip_stitch in next chain space beg3dccl ch2 3dccl in same space *ch2 3dccl ch2 3dccl in next chain space* repeat from * to * around ch2 close with a slip_stitch in top of beg3dccl 12 3dccl 12 ch2 space round 3 skip all cluster from round 2 work only in chain space slip_stitch in
